body: This really needs a rape tag
This shit turned into RYONA... tags are missing. I was not even able to get the cramps... shit.
err..... Waste good quality, the plot was shit

The author name Mayonnaise describes this perfectly.  This doujin should be offensive and awful, but instead it's just dull, bland and lifeless.  This is incredibly rapey, but everyone is completely bored, and all the girls look the same.  It's literally Mayonnaise in rape form.

His art sucks, and he can't write for shit.
Mayonnaise is trash. His dystopian slave girl niche is boring as fuck.
When the party was nice, the party was bumpin'~
Don't let Dreams be just dreams i guess.
I like what I see. I really do.
I only skimmed thru the preview but I’m quite confident to say: “what the fuck”

I knew this reminded me of a certain eromangaka. Oysters work is just a straight no, its a sadism thats simply pain for pains sake, not an ounce of pleasure. Mayonnaise is a far cry from them however, this is just lifeless. Its scenario is neat and all but the girls act like nothing but robotic sex dolls. 3/10.
I skimmed it and i have no clue what's going on

"No sense of stress or something ripping, causing the victim to engulf in a sea of unbearable suffering as it's most sacred body part is violated."

What the fuck, dude?

Ahhh Mayonnaise, the wanna be Oyster with autism but who never came even close to his level. First of all his characters are way to blanke and apathetic. Secondly he has no understanding of vaginas. For Mayonnaise they are only plastic bags that can be filled or scrapped without limits. No sense of stress or something ripping, causing the victim to engulf in a sea of unbearable suffering as it's most sacred body part is violated. Even his art style hasn't improved one little bit in all this years.
